audioText: Cette année, nous prendrons nos vacances en juillet pour profiter du beau temps estival.
question: When will they take their vacation?
options: In June for the summer weather
In July to enjoy the summer weather
explanation: The text states 'Cette année, nous prendrons nos vacances en juillet pour profiter du beau temps estival' - This year, we will take our vacation in July to enjoy the beautiful summer weather. The noun 'vacances' (vacation) is typically used in plural form in French.
